metadata.title: CVE-2020-12829 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In QEMU through 5.0.0, an integer overflow was found in the SM501 displaydriver implementation. This flaw occurs in the COPY_AREA macro whilehandling MMIO write operations through the sm501_2d_engine_write()callback. A local attacker could abuse this flaw to crash the QEMU processin sm501_2d_operation() in hw/display/sm501.c on the host, resulting in adenial of service.

criterions.comment: qemu package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
